title: Dark Energy Crystals Price: DEC Live Price Chart & News | CoinGecko
description: Track the latest Dark Energy Crystals price, market cap, trading volume, news and more with CoinGecko's live DEC price chart and popular cryptocurrency price tracker.
cleaned_text: Dark Energy Crystals (DEC) price has declined today. The price of Dark Energy Crystals (DEC) is $0.000757329074 today with a 24-hour trading volume of $7,287.91. Comparatively, the current price is 54.80% higher than the all-time low price. What is the fully diluted valuation of Dark Energy Crystals (DEC)? The fully diluted valuation (FDV) of Dark Energy Crystals (DEC) is $757,358,520. This is a statistical representation of the maximum market cap, assuming the maximum number of 1 Trillion DEC tokens are in circulation today. Depending on how the emission schedule of DEC tokens are designed, it might take multiple years before FDV is realized. How to add Dark Energy Crystals (DEC) to MetaMask? Adding Dark Energy Crystals (DEC) to [MetaMask](https://www.coingecko.com/learn/complete-beginners-guide-to-metamask) allows you to view your token holdings, trade on decentralized exchanges, and more. To add them, you'll need to import DEC as a token. You can copy DEC's contract address (0xe9d7023f2132d55cbd4ee1f78273cb7a3e74f10a) and import it manually, or if you've installed MetaMask's chrome extension, add DEC to MetaMask with one click on CoinGecko.
